name: Premiere Digital Services
tag_list: movies, films, features, online-media, digital-distribtuion, itunes, netflix, encoding, encode, transcode, transcoding, post-production, digital-post-production, los-angeles, entertainment, film-business, film-studio, movies-on-itunes, movies-on-mobile, d
overview:
PDS is a global leader in cloud-based digital asset management, storage and fulfillment. Headquartered in Los Angeles, with offices in Chicago and Bangalore, PDS provides the entertainment industry and international brands with the tools they need process, package and deliver digital content anywhere in the world. Major clients and partners include NBCUniversal, Warner Brothers Entertainment, Paramount Studios, Apple, Google, Amazon, Netflix, Microsoft and Hulu.

A sampling of the services PDS offers include: digital asset management, asset storage, ingest, encoding, quality control, repairs, finalization, trailer creation, asset conformance, cable edits and versioning, DCPs, laybacks, transcoding, digital packaging, web-based ordering and delivery. PDS also offers independent content producers aggregation services with select digital retailers, including iTunes, Google, Hulu, Sony, Amazon and more. PDS maintains one of the largest spinning video asset repositories in the world, and is an iTunes preferred encoding house.

Conceived and built for the digital age of media distribution, PDS is unencumbered by expensive legacy hardware and workflow, which allows the company to remain lean, nimble, and scalable. If you have digital content that needs to get somewhere, PDS is your answer.
